article_title: Sappi Papier Holding GmbH -- Moody's assigns Ba2 rating to Sappi's EUR250 million senior notes issuance
article_text: Moody's Investors Service, ("Moody's") has today assigned a Ba2 rating to the proposed issuance of EUR250 million senior unsecured notes due in 2025, by Sappi Papier Holding GmbH (Sappi Papier), a guaranteed subsidiary of Sappi Limited ("Sappi" or "the company"). Sappi's Ba2 corporate family rating (CFR), Ba2-PD probability of default rating (PDR) and all other instrument ratings under Sappi Papier remain unaffected.
